label: uncl9501
comment: Code qualifying the type of formula.

values.label: Order price revision
values.comment: The formula which enables the revision of a price from the date of order through to the date of delivery.

values.label: Penalty payment
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of a penalty payment.

values.label: Coefficient
values.comment: The formula for a coefficient calculation.

values.label: Catalogue adjustment
values.comment: The formula to adjust a catalogue.

values.label: Ceiling amount
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of a ceiling amount.

values.label: Provisional instalment payment
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of a provisional instalment.

values.label: Final instalment payment
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of a final instalment payment.

values.label: Bonus payment
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of a bonus payment.

values.label: Offer price revision
values.comment: The formula which enables the revision of a price from the date of offer through to the date of acceptance or award.

values.label: Adjustment
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of an adjustment.

values.label: Non-revisable instalment payment
values.comment: The formula for the calculation of an instalment payment that cannot be revised.
